title: High diamond top/mid main L/F Diamond/Master Team!
body:
Season 4 diamond 1 mid top main, currently d3, i im knowed for my mid lane zed in solo q, mid main champs: zed,ahri,xearth.   Top lane main champs, sion,riven,irelia, IGN: F R E E L O BOYZ

Twitch.tv/selfz

replies.body: he is fairly balanced, he can be beat mid lane fairly easy if the lane phase is played well against him. the trade off with his kit is simply he has no mana, he can trade nonstop if you do no punish him when he misses his combo.
Quick question. Do you think Zed is currently overpowered or fairly balanced? What are some trade offs with his kit compared to other mid laners?
